metadata.titleCn: 祁连山综合观测网：黑河流域地表过程综合观测网（张掖湿地站涡动相关仪-2020）
metadata.description:
This dataset contains the flux measurements from the Zhangye wetland station eddy covariance system (EC) in the midstream reaches of the Heihe integrated observatory network from January 1 to December 31 in 2020. The site (100.44640° E, 38.97514° N) was located in the Zhangye City in Gansu Province. The elevation is 1460 m. The EC was installed at a height of 5.2 m, and the sampling rate was 10 Hz. The sonic anemometer faced north, and the separation distance between the sonic anemometer and the CO2/H2O gas analyzer (Gill&Li7500A) was 0.25 m.
The raw data acquired at 10 Hz were processed using the Eddypro post-processing software, including the spike detection, lag correction of H2O/CO2 relative to the vertical wind component, sonic virtual temperature correction, coordinate rotation (2-D rotation), corrections for density fluctuation (Webb-Pearman-Leuning correction), and frequency response correction. The EC data were subsequently averaged over 30 min periods. The observation data quality was divided into three classes according to the quality assessment method of stationarity (Δst) and the integral turbulent characteristics test (ITC): class 1-3 (high quality), class 4-6 (good), class 7-8 (poor, better than gap filling data), class9 (rejected). In addition to the above processing steps, the half-hourly flux data were screened in a four-step procedure: (1) data from periods of sensor malfunction were rejected; (2) data collected before or after 1 h of precipitation were rejected; (3) incomplete 30 min data were rejected when the missing data constituted more than 3% of the 30 min raw record. There were 48 records per day, and the missing data were replaced with -6999. Suspicious data were marked in red. 
The released data contained the following variables: data/time, wind direction (Wdir, °), wind speed (Wnd, m/s), the standard deviation of the lateral wind (Std_Uy, m/s), virtual temperature (Tv, ℃), H2O mass density (H2O, g/m3), CO2 mass density (CO2, mg/m3), friction velocity (ustar, m/s), stability (z/L), sensible heat flux (Hs, W/m2), latent heat flux (LE, W/m2), carbon dioxide flux (Fc, mg/ (m2s)), quality assessment of the sensible heat flux (QA_Hs), quality assessment of the latent heat flux (QA_LE), and quality assessment of the carbon flux (QA_Fc). In this dataset, the time of 0:30 corresponds to the average data for the period between 0:00 and 0:30; the data were stored in *.xls format. Detailed information can be found in the suggested references.
For more information, please refer to Liu et al. (2018) (for sites information), Liu et al. (2011) for data processing) in the Citation section.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2020年1月1日至2020年12月31日的黑河水文气象观测网中游张掖湿地站涡动相关仪观测数据。站点位于甘肃省张掖市，下垫面是湿地。观测点的经纬度是100.44640E, 38.97514N，海拔1460.00m。涡动相关仪的架高5.2m，采样频率是10Hz，超声朝向是正北向，超声风速温度仪（Gill）与CO2/H2O分析仪(Li7500A)之间的距离是25cm。
涡动相关仪的原始观测数据为10Hz，发布的数据是采用Eddypro软件处理的30分钟数据，其处理的主要步骤包括：野点值剔除，延迟时间校正，坐标旋转（二次坐标旋转），频率响应修正，超声虚温修正和密度（WPL）修正等。同时对各通量值进行质量评价，主要是大气平稳性（Δst）和湍流相似性特征（ITC）的检验。对Eddypro软件输出的30min通量值也进行了筛选：（1）剔除仪器出错时的数据；（2）剔除降水前后1h的数据；（3）剔除10Hz原始数据中每30min内缺失率大于10%的数据。观测数据的平均周期为30分钟，一天48个数据，缺失数据标记为-6999。
发布的观测数据包括：日期/时间Date/Time，风向Wdir（°），水平风速Wnd（m/s），侧向风速标准差Std_Uy（m/s），超声虚温Tv（℃），水汽密度H2O（g/m3），二氧化碳浓度CO2（mg/m3），摩擦速度Ustar（m/s），奥布霍夫长度L（m），感热通量Hs（W/m2），潜热通量LE（W/m2），二氧化碳通量Fc（mg/(m2s)），感热通量的质量标识QA_Hs，潜热通量的质量标识QA_LE，二氧化碳通量的质量标识QA_Fc。感热、潜热、二氧化碳通量的质量标识分为九级（质量标识1-3数据质量好，4-6数据质量较好，7-8数据质量较差（较插补数据好）；9数据质量差））。数据时间的含义，如0:30代表0:00-0:30的平均；数据以*.xls格式存储。
黑河流域地表过程综合观测网或站点信息请参考Liu et al. (2018)，观测数据处理请参考Liu et al. (2011)。

background: Arid and semiarid regions represent approximately 30 % of the global terrestrial surface area (Dregne, 1991; Scanlon et al., 2006), and dryland expansion occurs under climate change, especially in developing countries (Huang et al., 2016). An oasis is a unique ecological landscape in arid and semi-arid areas that is not only the core of regions’ ecological environment but also the foundation of their economic development, especially in western China, which has been an important part of the “Silk Road” since ancient times. Oases comprising less than 10 % of the total area of arid regions support more than 90 % of the population in these regions of China (Chu et al., 2005; Li et al., 2016; Zhou et al., 2022). The oasis–desert system plays a crucial role in maintaining a stable ecological environment and agricultural productivity (Zhang and Zhao, 2015). Extensive studies have investigated energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas based on field and remote-sensing observations (Taha et al., 1991; Potchter et al., 2008; Xue et al., 2019; Wang et al., 2019; Zhou et al., 2022) and numerical simulations (Chu et al., 2005; Meng et al., 2009; Georgescu et al., 2011; Liu et al., 2020). In addition, oasis–desert areas located in semiarid regions have been found to be carbon sinks by previous researchers (Tagesson et al., 2016; Wang et al., 2019); thus, they can significantly affect the carbon balance of arid regions and play an increasingly important role within the global carbon cycle.
research objective: Therefore, it is critical to maintain the balance between oasis and desert systems in order to achieve the goal of sustainable oasis development. Understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems is important to achieve the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality in the oasis–desert area and support the ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis. A quantitative understanding of the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas is crucial to recognize the oasis–desert interactions and is significant to protect the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases; moreover, long-term observations are indispensable.
challenges: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas are facing the crisis of ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, the degradation of natural vegetation, the intensification of land desertification, and the frequent occurrence of dust storms, especially in many inland river basins westward along the Silk Road, such as the Tarim River basin (Zhao et al., 2013), the Aral Sea basin (Stanev et al., 2004; Crétaux et al., 2009), and the Lake Urmia basin (Stone, 2015).
methods: In this study, we present a suite of observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems that consist of long-term energy, water vapor, carbon and methane fluxes as well as auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters from 2012 to 2021. Half-hourly turbulent flux data were acquired by an eddy covariance system and scintillometer. The hydrometeorological data (including radiation, soil heat flux, and soil temperature profiles; gradients of air temperature and humidity and of wind speed and direction; and air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles) were observed from automatic weather stations with a 10 min average period as well as the groundwater table data. Moreover, vegetation and soil parameters were also supplemented in the datasets. The data processing and quality control procedure can be divided into data collection, data processing, and data archiving and sharing.
dataset: The study area comprises the middle and lower reaches of the HRB, located in the arid regions of western China, that receive water from the typical cryosphere of the upper reaches. A total of 11 land surface flux and meteorological stations have been established in these regions since 2012 – 2 superstations and 9 ordinary stations. The dataset of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas reported in this study (including energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes; hydrometeorological data; and vegetation and soil parameters) is freely available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
backgroundCn: 干旱和半干旱地区约占全球陆地表面积的30%（Dregne, 1991；Scanlon et al., 2006），在气候变化的影响下，干旱地区的扩展尤其发生在发展中国家（Huang et al., 2016）。绿洲是干旱和半干旱地区独特的生态景观，不仅是这些地区生态环境的核心，也是经济发展的基础，特别是在中国西部，自古以来就是“丝绸之路”的重要组成部分。绿洲占干旱地区总面积的不到10%，却支持了中国这些地区90%以上的人口（Chu et al., 2005；Li et al., 2016；Zhou et al., 2022）。绿洲-沙漠系统在维持稳定的生态环境和农业生产力方面发挥着至关重要的作用（Zhang and Zhao, 2015）。大量研究基于实地和遥感观测（Taha et al., 1991；Potchter et al., 2008；Xue et al., 2019；Wang et al., 2019；Zhou et al., 2022）以及数值模拟（Chu et al., 2005；Meng et al., 2009；Georgescu et al., 2011；Liu et al., 2020）对绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换进行了广泛研究。此外，先前的研究发现，位于半干旱地区的绿洲-沙漠区域是碳汇（Tagesson et al., 2016；Wang et al., 2019）；因此，它们可以显著影响干旱地区的碳平衡，并在全球碳循环中发挥越来越重要的作用。
research objectiveCn: 因此，维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于实现可持续绿洲发展的目标至关重要。了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，对于实现绿洲-沙漠地区的碳达峰和碳中和目标，以及支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展是非常重要的。对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解，对于认识绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用至关重要，并且对保护绿洲的生态稳定性和社会经济发展具有重要意义；此外，长期观测是不可或缺的。
challengesCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态环境退化的危机，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及沙尘暴频繁发生，尤其是在丝绸之路沿线的许多内陆河流流域，如塔里木河流域（赵等，2013），咸海流域（Stanev等，2004；Crétaux等，2009）和乌尔米湖流域（Stone，2015）。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，我们呈现了一套来自人工和自然绿洲-沙漠系统的观测数据集，涵盖了2012年至2021年的长期能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及涉及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。半小时的湍流通量数据是通过涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取的。水文气象数据（包括辐射、土壤热通量和土壤温度剖面；空气温度和湿度的梯度，以及风速和风向的梯度；空气压力、降水和土壤湿度剖面）是通过自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期观测的，同时也包括地下水位数据。此外，数据集中还补充了植被和土壤参数。数据处理和质量控制程序可以分为数据收集、数据处理和数据归档与共享。
datasetCn: 研究区域包括位于中国西部干旱地区的HRB中下游，水源来自上游典型的冰冻圈。自2012年以来，在这些地区建立了11个地表通量和气象站，包括2个超级站和9个普通站。本研究报告的绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换观测数据集（包括能量、水汽和碳通量；水文气象数据；以及植被和土壤参数）可从国家西藏高原数据中心免费获取。

Verification.QuestionEn: Is the eddy covariance system used as a data collection method for measuring energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes in arid regions?
Verification.QuestionCn: 涡度协方差系统是否被用作在干旱地区测量能量、水蒸气和碳通量的数据收集方法？

Verification.QuestionEn: Are there challenges related to ecological environment degradation in inland river basins of arid and semiarid areas?
Verification.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区的内陆河流流域中，生态环境退化相关的挑战有哪些？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Is the data processing for eddy covariance systems primarily handled through Eddypro software, manual correction methods, or automated algorithms?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 涡度协方差系统的数据处理主要通过Eddypro软件、手动修正方法或自动算法进行吗？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What data collection methods are used to gather hydrometeorological data in arid and semi-arid regions?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区，收集水文气象数据的方法有哪些？

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced when collecting ecological data in inland river basins of arid and semiarid areas?
Example.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区的内陆河流流域收集生态数据时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a challenge faced includes the crisis of ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, intensification of land desertification, and frequent dust storms, especially in many inland river basins westward along the Silk Road.
Example.AnswerCn: 面临的一个挑战包括生态环境退化的危机，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及频繁的沙尘暴，尤其是在丝绸之路沿线的许多内陆河流流域。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you give an example of a dataset that provides long-term observations of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个数据集的例子，该数据集提供了绿洲-沙漠地区能源、水汽和碳交换的长期观测？
Example.AnswerEn: A dataset providing long-term observations includes data from 11 land surface flux and meteorological stations established since 2012 in the middle and lower reaches of the HRB, which is freely available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个提供长期观测的数据集包括自2012年以来在HRB中下游建立的11个陆面通量和气象站的数据，该数据集可从国家西藏高原数据中心免费获取。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the critical parameters measured in oasis–desert ecosystems to assess energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 评估绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的关键参数包括哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: wind direction, horizontal wind speed, lateral wind speed standard deviation, ultrasonic virtual temperature, water vapor density, carbon dioxide concentration, friction velocity, Obukhov length, sensible heat flux, latent heat flux, carbon dioxide flux, radiation, soil heat flux, soil temperature profiles, gradients of air temperature and humidity
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 风向、水平风速、横向风速标准差、超声虚温、水汽密度、二氧化碳浓度、摩擦速度、奥布霍夫长度、感热通量、潜热通量、二氧化碳通量、辐射、土壤热通量、土壤温度剖面、空气温度和湿度梯度

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the challenges of maintaining long-term observational datasets in arid and semiarid regions, specifically with regards to ecological environment degradation?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区维护长期观测数据集有哪些挑战，特别是关于生态环境退化方面的挑战？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: drying rivers and lakes, natural vegetation degradation, land desertification, frequent dust storms
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 河流和湖泊干涸，自然植被退化，土地荒漠化，频繁的沙尘暴。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many land surface flux and meteorological stations have been established in the arid regions of western China since 2012 for data collection?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 自2012年以来，在中国西部的干旱地区建立了多少个地表通量和气象站用于数据收集？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the sampling frequency of the original observational data collected by the eddy covariance system?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 原始观测数据由涡度协方差系统收集的采样频率是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'eddy covariance system' entail in the context of data collection for hydrometeorological studies?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在水文气象研究的数据收集中，“涡度协方差系统”涉及什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: An eddy covariance system in the context of data collection for hydrometeorological studies involves the acquisition of half-hourly turbulent flux data, including energy, water vapor, carbon, and methane fluxes, using instruments such as an eddy covariance system and scintillometer.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在水文气象研究的背景下，涡度协方差系统涉及获取半小时的湍流通量数据，包括能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，使用的仪器包括涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by 'quality control procedure' in the context of processing hydrometeorological datasets?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在处理水文气象数据集的背景下，“质量控制程序”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: In the context of processing hydrometeorological datasets, a 'quality control procedure' refers to the steps involved in data collection, processing, and archiving to ensure the data is accurate and reliable. It includes specific processes such as data filtering, correction, and assessment of data quality using criteria like atmospheric stability and turbulence similarity features.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在水文气象数据集处理的背景下，“质量控制程序”指的是在数据收集、处理和归档过程中采取的步骤，以确保数据的准确性和可靠性。它包括特定的过程，如数据过滤、修正以及使用大气稳定性和湍流相似性特征等标准对数据质量进行评估。

Definition.QuestionEn: What defines an 'oasis–desert system' in terms of ecological and environmental research?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在生态和环境研究中，'绿洲–沙漠系统'的定义是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: An 'oasis–desert system' in terms of ecological and environmental research is defined as a unique ecological landscape in arid and semi-arid areas that is crucial for maintaining a stable ecological environment and agricultural productivity. It serves as the core of regions' ecological environment and is foundational to their economic development, particularly in arid regions like western China.
Definition.AnswerCn: “绿洲-沙漠系统”在生态和环境研究中被定义为一种独特的生态景观，存在于干旱和半干旱地区，对于维持稳定的生态环境和农业生产力至关重要。它是这些地区生态环境的核心，并且是其经济发展的基础，特别是在像中国西部这样的干旱地区。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How can the integration of eddy covariance systems and scintillometers improve the interpretation of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange data in arid regions?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 涡度相关系统和闪烁仪的集成如何改善对干旱地区能量、水汽和碳交换数据的解读？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The integration of eddy covariance systems and scintillometers allows for detailed acquisition of half-hourly turbulent flux data, which can enhance the understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems. This comprehensive data collection method provides insights into the interactions within these ecosystems, which are crucial for maintaining ecological stability and understanding the impacts of climate change.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差系统与闪烁仪的结合可以详细获取半小时的湍流通量数据，这有助于增强对绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的理解。这种综合数据收集方法提供了对这些生态系统内部相互作用的洞察，这对于维持生态稳定性和理解气候变化的影响至关重要。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What challenges in data collection and processing might arise from the complex environmental conditions in oasis–desert areas, and how can they be addressed to ensure data quality and reliability?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠地区复杂的环境条件下，数据收集和处理可能会出现哪些挑战，以及如何解决这些问题以确保数据质量和可靠性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas face challenges such as ecological degradation and frequent dust storms, which can complicate data collection. Addressing these challenges involves implementing robust data processing and quality control procedures, such as filtering erroneous data and correcting for environmental factors like precipitation, to maintain the reliability of the datasets.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态退化和频繁沙尘暴等挑战，这可能会使数据收集变得复杂。应对这些挑战需要实施稳健的数据处理和质量控制程序，例如过滤错误数据和纠正降水等环境因素，以保持数据集的可靠性。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways can long-term datasets from multiple meteorological stations contribute to a better understanding of the oasis–desert interactions and support sustainable development in these regions?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 来自多个气象站的长期数据集可以通过哪些方式促进对绿洲-沙漠相互作用的更好理解，并支持这些地区的可持续发展？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Long-term datasets from multiple meteorological stations provide a comprehensive view of energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes, as well as hydrometeorological, vegetation, and soil parameters. Such datasets are critical for recognizing oasis–desert interactions, supporting ecological security, and guiding sustainable development strategies by providing insights into the dynamics of these ecosystems over time.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 来自多个气象站的长期数据集提供了能源、水汽和碳通量，以及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的全面视角。这些数据集对于识别绿洲与沙漠之间的相互作用、支持生态安全以及指导可持续发展战略至关重要，因为它们提供了对这些生态系统随时间变化的洞察。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the need for specific data processing steps like coordinate rotation and frequency response correction in eddy covariance systems for wetland observations?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在湿地观测的涡度协方差系统中，特定数据处理步骤如坐标旋转和频率响应校正的需求受到哪些因素的影响？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Data processing steps such as coordinate rotation and frequency response correction are necessary to ensure accurate and consistent measurements of energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes. These steps address issues related to instrument setup, such as the orientation of sensors and potential frequency distortions, thereby facilitating reliable data collection and analysis.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 数据处理步骤，如坐标旋转和频率响应校正，对于确保能量、水汽和碳通量的准确和一致的测量是必要的。这些步骤解决了与仪器设置相关的问题，例如传感器的方向和潜在的频率失真，从而促进可靠的数据收集和分析。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is it critical to maintain a balance between oasis and desert systems when collecting long-term data on energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在收集关于能量、水汽和碳交换的长期数据时，为什么在绿洲和沙漠系统之间保持平衡是至关重要的？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Maintaining a balance between oasis and desert systems is essential to support the ecological security and sustainable development of oases. It ensures that the interactions between these systems are accurately captured, which is crucial for understanding their role in carbon cycling and achieving goals like carbon peaking and neutrality.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展至关重要。这确保了准确捕捉这些系统之间的相互作用，这对于理解它们在碳循环中的作用以及实现碳达峰和碳中和等目标至关重要。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of implementing rigorous data quality control procedures on the reliability of hydrometeorological datasets in arid and semiarid regions?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区实施严格的数据质量控制程序对水文气象数据集的可靠性可能产生的后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Implementing rigorous data quality control procedures can significantly enhance the reliability of hydrometeorological datasets. By filtering out erroneous data, correcting for time lags, and performing frequency response corrections, the datasets become more accurate and dependable, which is crucial for understanding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in arid and semiarid environments. This process ensures that the data can be used effectively to support ecological stability and sustainable development in these regions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 实施严格的数据质量控制程序可以显著提高水文气象数据集的可靠性。通过过滤错误数据、修正时间延迟和进行频率响应校正，这些数据集变得更加准确和可靠，这对于理解干旱和半干旱环境中的能量、水汽和碳交换至关重要。这个过程确保数据能够有效支持这些地区的生态稳定和可持续发展。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How might the integration of auxiliary data, such as vegetation and soil parameters, influence the interpretation of energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes in oasis-desert ecosystems?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 辅助数据的整合，例如植被和土壤参数，如何影响对绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳通量的解释？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Integrating auxiliary data like vegetation and soil parameters can provide a comprehensive understanding of the factors influencing energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes. This additional context can enable researchers to identify interactions between biotic and abiotic components, offering insights into the underlying processes that drive these exchanges in oasis-desert ecosystems. Consequently, it supports the development of more robust models and strategies for maintaining ecological balance and promoting sustainable development.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 整合植被和土壤参数等辅助数据可以提供对影响能量、水蒸气和碳通量因素的全面理解。这些额外的背景信息可以使研究人员识别生物和非生物成分之间的相互作用，从而深入了解驱动这些交换的基本过程在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的作用。因此，这有助于开发更稳健的模型和策略，以维持生态平衡并促进可持续发展。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What outcomes might arise from the establishment of long-term observational datasets in understanding the interactions between oasis and desert systems?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 建立长期观测数据集可能会产生哪些结果，以理解绿洲和沙漠系统之间的相互作用？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The establishment of long-term observational datasets can lead to a deeper understanding of the interactions between oasis and desert systems. Such datasets provide valuable insights into the temporal dynamics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges, which are crucial for recognizing patterns and trends over time. This knowledge can inform strategies to maintain ecological balance, support sustainable development, and address challenges like desertification and the degradation of natural resources in these regions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 建立长期观测数据集可以加深对绿洲和沙漠系统之间相互作用的理解。这些数据集提供了关于能量、水蒸气和碳交换的时间动态的宝贵见解，这对于识别时间上的模式和趋势至关重要。这些知识可以为维持生态平衡、支持可持续发展以及应对沙漠化和自然资源退化等挑战提供信息。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the primary objectives of collecting long-term energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange data in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集绿洲-沙漠生态系统中长期能量、水蒸气和碳交换数据的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objectives are to understand the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems, which is crucial to achieving carbon peaking and carbon neutrality in these areas. It also supports the ecological security and sustainable development of oases by recognizing oasis–desert interactions and maintaining ecological stability and socioeconomic development.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，这对于实现这些地区的碳达峰和碳中和至关重要。通过认识绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用，维护生态稳定和社会经济发展，这也支持了绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the significance of using eddy covariance systems and scintillometers in the collection of energy and carbon flux data in arid and semiarid regions?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪收集能量和碳通量数据有什么意义？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Using eddy covariance systems and scintillometers is significant as they provide half-hourly turbulent flux data, which is crucial for capturing the dynamics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges. These instruments enable detailed monitoring and analysis of the interactions between the oasis and desert systems, contributing to a better understanding of the ecological and climatic processes in these regions.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪是重要的，因为它们提供半小时的湍流通量数据，这对于捕捉能量、水蒸气和碳交换的动态至关重要。这些仪器能够详细监测和分析绿洲与沙漠系统之间的相互作用，有助于更好地理解这些地区的生态和气候过程。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the specific procedures and steps involved in processing eddy covariance data to obtain reliable flux measurements in arid and semiarid regions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区处理涡度协方差数据以获得可靠的通量测量涉及哪些具体程序和步骤？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The procedures for processing eddy covariance data include using Eddypro software to handle the raw 10Hz data. Key steps involve outlier removal, time delay correction, coordinate rotation (double rotation), frequency response correction, ultrasonic virtual temperature correction, and density (WPL) correction. Additionally, quality evaluation of flux values is performed based on atmospheric stability and turbulence similarity tests. Data is further filtered to exclude data with instrument errors, data affected by precipitation, and data with significant gaps in the 10Hz raw data.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 处理涡度协方差数据的程序包括使用Eddypro软件处理原始10Hz数据。关键步骤包括异常值去除、时间延迟校正、坐标旋转（双旋转）、频率响应校正、超声波虚拟温度校正和密度（WPL）校正。此外，还根据大气稳定性和湍流相似性测试对通量值进行质量评估。数据进一步过滤，以排除仪器错误的数据、受降水影响的数据以及原始10Hz数据中存在显著缺口的数据。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What data processing and quality control techniques enable the accurate assessment of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in desert-oasis systems?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些数据处理和质量控制技术能够准确评估沙漠-绿洲系统中的能量、水汽和碳交换？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The data processing and quality control procedure involve data collection, processing, and archiving. Techniques such as the use of Eddypro software for processing 10Hz raw data into 30-minute intervals, frequency response correction, ultrasonic virtual temperature correction, and density (WPL) correction are employed. Quality evaluation includes checks on atmospheric stability and turbulence similarity characteristics.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 数据处理和质量控制程序包括数据收集、处理和归档。采用的技术包括使用Eddypro软件将10Hz的原始数据处理为30分钟间隔，频率响应校正、超声波虚拟温度校正和密度（WPL）校正。质量评估包括对大气稳定性和湍流相似性特征的检查。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do technological advancements in meteorological instrumentation enable comprehensive data collection in arid and semi-arid regions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 技术进步在气象仪器方面如何使干旱和半干旱地区的综合数据收集成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Technological advancements such as the use of eddy covariance systems, scintillometers, and automatic weather stations facilitate the comprehensive collection of turbulent flux data and hydrometeorological data. These instruments are capable of measuring parameters like radiation, soil heat flux, air temperature, and water vapor concentrations with high temporal resolution.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 技术进步，如涡度协方差系统、闪烁仪和自动气象站，促进了湍流通量数据和水气象数据的全面收集。这些仪器能够以高时间分辨率测量辐射、土壤热通量、空气温度和水蒸气浓度等参数。

Enablement.QuestionEn: In what ways do long-term observational datasets enhance the understanding of oasis-desert interactions within arid regions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 长期观测数据集在增强对干旱地区绿洲与沙漠相互作用的理解方面有哪些作用？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Long-term observational datasets provide critical insights into the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange processes that occur in oasis-desert systems. By collecting data over extended periods, researchers can better understand the interactions and dynamics that contribute to the ecological stability and socio-economic development of oases.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 长期观测数据集为我们提供了关于绿洲-沙漠系统中能量、水汽和碳交换过程的重要见解。通过长期收集数据，研究人员可以更好地理解影响绿洲生态稳定性和社会经济发展的相互作用和动态。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might data collection in oasis–desert ecosystems require long-term observations to achieve sustainable development goals?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，数据收集可能需要长期观察，以实现可持续发展目标的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: A quantitative understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas is crucial for recognizing interactions in these ecosystems and is significant for protecting their ecological stability and socioeconomic development. Long-term observations are indispensable to this understanding.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解对于认识这些生态系统中的相互作用至关重要，并且对保护它们的生态稳定性和社会经济发展具有重要意义。长期观测对这一理解是不可或缺的。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why are challenges such as ecological degradation in arid and semiarid inland river basins particularly concerning for data collection efforts?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱内陆河流流域，生态退化等挑战对数据收集工作特别令人担忧的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas face the crisis of ecological environment degradation, such as drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, intensification of land desertification, and frequent dust storms, making data collection efforts more challenging and critical.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态环境退化的危机，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及频繁的沙尘暴，这使得数据收集工作变得更加困难和重要。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the potential challenges in maintaining data accuracy and reliability when using eddy covariance systems in arid and semiarid regions?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区使用涡度协方差系统时，维护数据准确性和可靠性的潜在挑战有哪些？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas are facing ecological environment degradation, such as drying rivers, vegetation degradation, and dust storms, which can affect data collection accuracy. Additionally, the data processing includes steps like removing erroneous data and correcting delays, highlighting the challenges of ensuring data accuracy and reliability.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态环境退化的问题，例如河流干涸、植被退化和沙尘暴，这可能影响数据收集的准确性。此外，数据处理包括去除错误数据和修正延迟等步骤，突显了确保数据准确性和可靠性的挑战。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How might the methodologies used for data quality control in oasis–desert systems improve the understanding of energy and carbon exchange patterns?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统中用于数据质量控制的方法论如何改善对能量和碳交换模式的理解？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The data quality control procedure, which includes steps like coordinate rotation and frequency response correction, aims to improve data accuracy. This meticulous processing helps in gaining a quantitative understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges, crucial for recognizing oasis–desert interactions and ensuring ecological stability.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 数据质量控制程序，包括坐标旋转和频率响应校正等步骤，旨在提高数据的准确性。这种细致的处理有助于定量理解能量、水汽和碳的交换，对于识别绿洲-沙漠相互作用和确保生态稳定至关重要。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I’m unsure about the challenges faced in collecting accurate data on energy and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中收集能量和碳交换的准确数据所面临的挑战感到不确定。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand why it's difficult to maintain data quality over an extended period in environmental observation networks.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白为什么在环境观测网络中，长期维护数据质量会很困难。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Maintaining data quality is challenging due to the necessity of long-term observations and the potential for data loss from instrument errors, weather conditions, or data gaps that need to be addressed through quality control procedures.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 维护数据质量是一个挑战，因为需要长期观察，并且可能由于仪器错误、天气条件或数据缺失而导致数据丢失，这些问题需要通过质量控制程序来解决。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how datasets related to hydrometeorological data in oasis–desert areas are structured and shared.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解与绿洲-沙漠地区的水文气象数据相关的数据集是如何结构化和共享的。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Hydrometeorological data, including radiation, soil heat flux, temperature profiles, and more, are collected at automatic weather stations and structured in datasets that are processed, archived, and shared, with data available from platforms like the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 水文气象数据，包括辐射、土壤热通量、温度剖面等，都是在自动气象站收集的，并以数据集的形式进行处理、存档和共享，数据可通过国家西藏高原数据中心等平台获取。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please summarize the typical data collection techniques used for hydrometeorological observations in oasis-desert ecosystems.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn:
在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，典型的水文气象观测数据收集技术包括：

1. **气象站**：安装自动气象站以监测温度、湿度、降水量、风速和风向等气象参数。
2. **土壤湿度传感器**：使用土壤湿度传感器测量土壤中的水分含量，以评估水分状况。
3. **水位监测**：通过水位计监测地下水位和河流、湖泊的水位变化。
4. **遥感技术**：利用卫星和无人机进行地表温度、植被覆盖和土壤湿度的遥感监测。
5. **气象球和探空仪**：用于高空气象观测，获取大气层中温度、湿度和风速等数据。
6. **降水收集器**：设置雨量计收集降水数据，以分析降水模式和趋势。
7. **蒸发皿**：用于测量蒸发量，评估水分损失。

这些技术结合使用，可以提供全面的水文气象数据，帮助研究和管理绿洲-沙漠生态系统。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The hydrometeorological data collection techniques in oasis-desert ecosystems typically involve using automatic weather stations to capture data such as radiation, soil heat flux, soil temperature profiles, air temperature and humidity gradients, wind speed and direction, air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles. These data are recorded with a 10-minute average period and complemented by groundwater table data.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，水文气象数据收集技术通常涉及使用自动气象站来捕捉数据，例如辐射、土壤热通量、土壤温度剖面、空气温度和湿度梯度、风速和风向、气压、降水量以及土壤湿度剖面。这些数据以10分钟的平均周期记录，并辅以地下水位数据。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please describe the challenges faced in maintaining data quality and integrity in long-term environmental monitoring in arid and semiarid regions.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区，长期环境监测中维护数据质量和完整性面临的挑战包括：
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Challenges in maintaining data quality and integrity in arid and semiarid regions include dealing with ecological degradation like drying rivers and lakes, vegetation degradation, land desertification, and frequent dust storms. These environmental issues can affect data collection and require rigorous data processing, quality control, and archiving strategies to ensure reliable long-term observations.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区，维护数据质量和完整性面临的挑战包括应对生态退化，如河流和湖泊干涸、植被退化、土地沙漠化以及频繁的沙尘暴。这些环境问题可能影响数据收集，并需要严格的数据处理、质量控制和归档策略，以确保可靠的长期观测。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please outline the key features and methodologies used in processing and quality control of eddy covariance flux data in arid regions.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 概述在干旱地区处理和质量控制涡度协方差通量数据的关键特征和方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Key features and methodologies for processing eddy covariance flux data include using software like Eddypro for data processing, which involves steps such as outlier removal, time delay correction, coordinate rotation, frequency response correction, ultrasonic virtual temperature correction, and density corrections. Quality control involves evaluating the data for atmospheric stability and turbulence similarity, and filtering out erroneous data, such as those affected by instrument errors or rainfall.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 处理涡度协方差通量数据的关键特征和方法包括使用Eddypro等软件进行数据处理，涉及的步骤有异常值去除、时间延迟校正、坐标旋转、频率响应校正、超声虚温校正和密度校正。质量控制包括评估数据的气氛稳定性和湍流相似性，并过滤掉受仪器错误或降雨影响的错误数据。
